task.title: How to divide numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for using the multiplication function of the JPS Calculation App.

prereq.p: To successfully divide numbers, you must know what division is

result.p: The result of the division is displayed.

example.p: The equation will look like this: 81 รท 9.
You enter 81. Press รท. Enter 9. Press the equal sign.
The result of 9 will appear on the screen.
